text: Miserable hit piece. The Brazil study has these problems: 81 hospitalized patients, #chloroquine not #hydroxychloriquine, very high dose (1200 mg for 10 days in one group of whom 27% died by day 13), no #zinc, very late start. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump @ScottAdamsSays @zev_dr https://t.co/dxOF0DHiRy
